channel.title: How to add pk points to shop
channel.description: Hi this is a 317 server help how can i add pk point shop to my server i know how to add the shop but when u buy somthing its with coins not pk points how can i change it to points please post help or vid no flamming will give admin for any help contact me with a message reply or my msn skatertravis11@hotmail.com thanks!

item.title: How to add pk points to shop
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

no you see the thing is i posted a tutorial on this and answered that question 3 times in the server help section and the posts were still new, they were like sticking out on the first page with the name “ytuio9” beside them. i guess he was too busy leeching a bit though so he didn’t see the post.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add pk points to shop

item.title: How to add pk points to shop
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

well, if its too much for you to answer a simple question twice, then just don’t answer it. its as simple as that. no need to yell at someone for asking a question…

Read full topic

item.title: How to add pk points to shop
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Deathrod, post:3, topic:329937”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=426323.msg3131844#msg3131844 date=1266579710]
i already answered somebody with that question, USE THE FUCKING SEARCH BUTTON!!!
[/quote]
you can atleast give the code fag go flame somewhere else[/quote]
geez look at the damn post date it’s been like 5 months since that was posted. and you’re calling me a “fag”. i bet you can’t even do it which is why you’re cursing around and flaming. instead of flaming just go learn java and stop leeching.
also, i had answered that question about 3 times that day so i believe saying “use the FUCKING search button” was justifiable on my account.

Read full topic
